channel.title: RSCD sprite editor error loading images
channel.description:
Hey guys, Ive got the sprite editor open and running.. now I want to load an image.. however when I press 'Load image' or 'Load sprite' it throws this exception:
[code] [java] Exception in thread "AWT-EventQueue-0" java.lang.RuntimeException: ava.io.IOException: Could not get shell folder ID list [java] at sun.awt.shell.Win32ShellFolderManager2$ComInvoker.invoke(Un own Source) [java] at sun.awt.shell.Win32ShellFolder2.getFileSystemPath(Unknown S rce) [java] at sun.awt.shell.Win32ShellFolderManager2.getPersonal(Unknown urce) [java] at sun.awt.shell.Win32ShellFolder2$10.call(Unknown Source) [java] at sun.awt.shell.Win32ShellFolder2$10.call(Unknown Source) [java] at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Sourc
[java] at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) [java] at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unkn n Source) [java] at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown urce) [java] at sun.awt.shell.Win32ShellFolderManager2$ComInvoker$3.run(Unk wn Source) [java] at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [java] Caused by: java.io.IOException: Could not get shell folder ID list [java] at sun.awt.shell.Win32ShellFolder2.getFileSystemPath0(Native M hod) [java] at sun.awt.shell.Win32ShellFolder2.access$900(Unknown Source) [java] at sun.awt.shell.Win32ShellFolder2$8.call(Unknown Source) [java] at sun.awt.shell.Win32ShellFolder2$8.call(Unknown Source) [java] ... 11 more[/code]
Can anyone tell me why??
Thanks!

item.title: RSCD sprite editor error loading images
item.dc:creator: @Grr_Pker127 Grr Pker127
item.description:
@Grr_Pker127 wrote:

Lol fuck I did read it… I know that it cant get the shell folder id list.

I’ll ask a different question… how do I fix this issue?
